text: “Saka chiendai kwaari muri vaviri mobva mati: ‘Zvirokwazvo, tiri vatumwa vaTenzi vako (iwewe Farawo). Saka titume (tiende) nevana veIzirairi uyezve usave unovaranga. Zvirokwazvo, tauya nehumboo kubva kuna Tenzi vako (Allah). Uye runyararo ruchave pane uyo achatevedzera gwara rakaswatuka (kutenda muna Allah)!’”
